A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The step we need\, but maybe not the steps many fans wanted. This is an epic movie with unexpected and sometimes even unnessecary moments and storylines. Somehow original somehow a kick in the old ways we know of the saga. I would even say it does not feel like Star Wars anymore.\nIs that a bad thing? Hell no. For everyone who thought Force Awakens to be a clone of A New Hope\, this is the new road you hoped for.
